sentences.english: Over-fed women and their gluttonous husbands.
sentences.chinese: 喫得過多的女人和她們嘴饞的丈夫。

sentences.english: It is the fresh fruit that tempts me at this time of year.
sentences.chinese: 一年的這個時候讓我嘴饞的是新鮮水果。

sentences.english: He ate that much entirely for he was greedy in his mouth but not he was hungry.
sentences.chinese: 他完全是嘴饞才喫那麼多，不可能是肚子餓。

sentences.english: What is the best way to fight food cravings?
sentences.chinese: 對抗嘴饞的最佳方法是什麼？

sentences.english: Some guy greedy mouth of the first move, so we have a fight to.
sentences.chinese: 一些嘴饞的傢伙先動了口，於是，大家紛紛動起手來。

sentences.english: I love cats , and I used to raise one.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個愛喫的人，很嘴饞。

sentences.english: The old man’s eyes opened greedily and immediately he began to complain.
sentences.chinese: 老人嘴饞地大掙着眼睛，可馬上又嘮叨起來。

sentences.english: My greediness, unable to control into the hands of a meat.
sentences.chinese: 我的嘴饞了，控制不住的手伸向一個肉糉。

sentences.english: It is a sheer greed that makes him eat so much, he cannot be hungry.
sentences.chinese: 他完全是嘴饞才喫那麼多，不可能是肚子餓。

definition: to put on weight/to get fat
to have eaten and drunk to one's heart's content
to eat and eat/to stuff oneself
fried chicken pieces with salt and pepper/Taiwan-style fried chicken
(video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
rice congee made with red beans, lotus seeds, longan, red dates, nuts etc
